LanguageData.Bullet_Melodic_Cudgel.label: Melodic Cudgel bullet
LanguageData.RWBY_Melodic_Cudgel_Gun.label: Melodic Cudgel
LanguageData.RWBY_Melodic_Cudgel_Gun.description: Melodic Cudgel is Roman Torchwick's signature weapon. Melodic Cudgel initially appears to be a normal cane; however, when used for combat, it has some tricks up its sleeve.
LanguageData.RWBY_Melodic_Cudgel_Gun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RWBY_Melodic_Cudgel_Gun.tools.1.label: barrel

LanguageData.RWBY_Melodic_Cudgel_Hook.description: Melodic Cudgel is Roman Torchwick's signature weapon. Melodic Cudgel initially appears to be a normal cane; however, when used for combat, it has some tricks up its sleeve.
